body: These can be a photograph, photocopy or scan of the original document.

components.hint: For example a copy of their driving licence or passport. Maximum size: 7MB per file
components.label: Photo ID
components.name: auto_name__30

components.hint: For example an electricity or council tax bill in their name and it must be dated within the last 6 months. Maximum file size: 7MB
components.label: Proof of address
components.name: auto_name__31

components.html: If the person you're requesting information for is on probation and does not have any ID, we can accept a photograph or a scan of a letter signed by their probation officer on Probation Service headed paper.
components.summary: If they don't have any ID

heading: Upload their ID
lede: You must upload both proof of ID and address.
